# Unicode.GeneralCategory.lineSeparator

**Case**

A line separator, which is specifically (and only) U+2028 LINE SEPARATOR.

## Declaration

```swift
case lineSeparator
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Line_Separator` (abbreviated `Zl`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.lineSeparator
